caption.p: Effect of the human equivalent dose (HED) of the concoction on ROS production by rat peritoneal cells. ROS production by peritoneal phagocytic cells harvested from rats treated with HED of the concoction, prednisolone (10â€‰mg/ml), and water as control. Cells treated with diphenyleneiodonium chloride (DPI) used as in vitro positive control.
